caption: Figure 7: t-SNE plots of the text and image embeddings, computed by Moondream2 fine-tuned with Standard FT and WAFFLE-attn.
description: This t-SNE plot visualizes the embeddings generated by Moondream2, a model fine-tuned using two different methods: Standard FT and WAFFLE-attn.  The plot shows the relationships between image embeddings (red circles) and text embeddings (blue triangles). In the Standard FT plot (a), image and text embeddings are far apart, indicating a lack of alignment between visual and textual understanding. In contrast, the WAFFLE-attn plot (b) shows a much closer grouping of image and text embeddings, demonstrating that the WAFFLE-attn method effectively aligns the model's understanding of visual and textual data.
